bladdr 0.0.8.0
  • Reference

    Function reference

    Exploratory Data Analysis

    Functions for rapid data exploration.

    eda_heatmap()
    Make a heatmap of a select number of genes
    eda_n_gene()
    Plot the expression of one or two genes with an optional stratifier
    eda_one_gene()
    Plot the expression of one gene across a stratifying argument
    eda_two_gene()
    Plot the expression of two genes

    Utilities

    Misc. quality of life functions.

    dilute()
    Calculate dilution from known concentrations
    dummy_rna_conc
    Example data of RNA samples with concentrations
    get_gene_expression()
    Get expression of gene by indices in a dds
    make_pipette_vol()
    Round volume to be pipette-compatible
    summon_cell_data()
    Summon cell line data
    theme_tufte()
    ggplot theme in the style of Edward Tufte
    volcano_plot()
    Make a volcano plot from a dds results
